description: FALSIFICATION: Tiny energy_reg (1e-10) + detach_epos. Tests whether a negligible reg can arrest q214 explosion (E→9e13) without suppressing pred_norm like q212 (reg=0.01 → pred→0). At E=447k: reg_grad=2e-10*447k=9e-5 (negligible). At E=9e13: reg_grad=0.18 (arrests explosion). If pred_norm reaches ~19.4 and val MSE→0.0097, the Goldilocks window exists. If not, energy-value contrastive is dead.
notes: Same as q214 (detach_epos=True) but with energy_reg_weight=1e-10. At E=447k: reg_gradient=9e-5 (negligible, should not suppress pred). At E=9e13: reg_gradient=0.18 (arrests explosion). SUCCESS criteria: pred_norm→19.4, val MSE→0.0097 by step 5k-10k. FAILURE criteria: pred_norm still explodes (>100 at step 1k) OR collapses (<1 at step 10k). Abort analysis by step 5k if clearly failing.
